duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute data input requests accurately and timely support and completion of projects and initiatives.
Provide insights into process improvement opportunities related to day-to-day activities.
Work directly with all internal BRS departments to drive open issues to closure.
Manage internal customer communications related to data requests.
Maintain accuracy in all relevant data submissions and support the Manager in testing, implementing, and documenting new processes.
Identify and implement audits of data sets to ensure consistency and accuracy across the customer base.
Demonstrate a basic knowledge of all facets of the new customer implementation process and provide guidance and support for activities related to customer exit process.
Work closely with the Manager of Customer Experience team to analyze data related to account structure improvement and implement necessary systemic updates.
Maintain accuracy of data sets per established process and manage analysis and input of relevant data fields into the AS400 operating system.
Produce/maintain work product/data populations with a high degree of accuracy and limited need for repeated supervisor intervention.
Successfully complete projects accurately and within the allotted timeline.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred and a minimum of 5 years of experience related to data entry and data management (Master's preferred)
